title: Can I say Rabbana taqabbal minna innaka antas Sami ul Aleem in sujood/ after good deed assimalhakeem
transcript: If I say this in my with the intention that Allah accepts my salah or after doing any good deed, will it be an innovation? Any dua you say in sujud from the Quran or from the sunnah is acceptable? There is no innovation in that. You're asking Allah and Allah will reply and answer you, answer your dua.
